text: Vladimir Găitan (; 2 February 1947 – 10 November 2020) was a Romanian actor. He appeared in more than forty movies beginning in 1968. He was born in Suceava, Romania. He was best known for his roles in The Reenactment, Pe Aici Nu Se Trece, Accident, Uncle Marin, the Billionaire, Mihail, câine de circ, Last Night of Love, Mircea and The Man of the Day. Găitan died on 10 November 2020 in Bucharest from stomach cancer, aged 73.Vladimir Găitan dies of cancer on Hotnews.ro ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Romania Category:Romanian movie actors Category:Romanian television actors Category:Romanian stage actors Category:People from Rome
title: Vladimir Găitan
